statements: UPDATE Inventory SET current_stock = 50, restock_level = 20 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE Inventory SET product_name = 'New Product Name', current_stock = 100, sales_data = '{"last_sale_date": "2022-10-15", "last_sale_amount": 50}' WHERE product_id = 2;
UPDATE Inventory SET current_stock = current_stock + 10, restock_level = restock_level - 5 WHERE product_id = 1001
UPDATE Inventory SET sales_data = '{"total_sales": 500, "last_sale": "2022-10-15"}' WHERE product_id = 2005
UPDATE Inventory SET product_name = 'New Product' WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE Restock SET restock_date = '2022-01-15 10:00:00' WHERE restock_id = 2;
UPDATE Inventory SET current_quantity = current_quantity - 1, sales_count = sales_count + 1 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE Restock SET restock_quantity = restock_quantity + 10, restock_date = '2022-05-20 10:00:00' WHERE product_id = 201;
UPDATE inventory SET current_stock = current_stock - 5 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE sales SET sale_amount = sale_amount + 50.0 WHERE quantity_sold > 10;
UPDATE inventory SET current_stock = current_stock + 10 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE sales SET quantity_sold = quantity_sold - 5, sale_amount = sale_amount * 1.1 WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE product_inventory SET in_stock_qty = 50 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE sales_data SET sale_amount = 150.75, sale_qty = 5 WHERE sale_id = 201;
UPDATE product_inventory SET in_stock_qty = 50, last_restock_date = '2021-10-15' WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE sales_data SET sale_qty = 10, sale_amount = 150.75 WHERE sale_id = 201;
UPDATE inventory SET current_stock = current_stock - 5 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE products SET price = price * 1.1 WHERE category = 'Electronics';
UPDATE inventory SET current_stock = current_stock - 5, restock_level = 30 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE products SET price = price * 1.1, category = 'New Category' WHERE product_id = 202;
